project_portfolio_desc: This website, built on Vite (React). Nothing fancy.
project_discord_reporter_desc: A lightweight Discord-logger Minecraft plugin to keep your server safe and moderated.
project_ig_video_yoinker_desc: Instagram bot that reposts reels from DMs with video processing and rate limit handling.
project_toasterjs_desc: Vanilla JS toast notification library for user-friendly messages in web apps.
project_webhook_panel_desc: Basic Discord webhook generator panel. Nothing too crazy.
project_barber_booking_desc: [NOT-COMPLETED] Full-stack barber booking platform with Next.js, customer page and dashboard.
contact_intro: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project in mind, want to discuss web development, or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
quote_power_electricity: With great power comes great electricity bill
quote_predict_invent: The best way to predict the future is to invent it
quote_life_react: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it
quote_limit_doubt: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today
quote_success_courage: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts
quote_love_work: The only way to do great work is to love what you do
quote_miss_shots: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take
quote_future_dreams: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
quote_slowly_stop: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
quote_impossible_journey: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin
quote_believe_halfway: Believe you can and you're halfway there
quote_act_difference: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does
quote_success_busy: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it
quote_clock_keepgoing: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going
quote_reputation_do: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do
quote_future_today: The future depends on what you do today
quote_revenge_success: The best revenge is massive success
quote_time_limited: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life
quote_achieve_impossible: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible
quote_success_difference: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world
quote_success_dictionary: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary
quote_success_enthusiasm: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm
quote_started_doing: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
quote_giveup_good: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great
quote_greatness_permission: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission
quote_success_who: Success is not in what you have, but who you are
quote_happiness_success: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful
exp_intern_desc: Completed my first international internship in Barcelona through the EU Erasmus+ program. Gained hands-on experience in professional workflows, contributed to real projects, and continued to sharpen my development skills.
exp_indie_desc: Launched several projects, including Discord bots, Minecraft mods, and hosting services. Built and maintained websites for two bridal companies, applying both technical and client-facing skills.
exp_student_desc: Began studies at Arkas Vocational High School, specializing in software engineering. Balanced coursework with personal development and freelance projects.
exp_freelance_desc: Started building websites independently and took on freelance projects through Fiverr, delivering solutions to real clients and learning to manage end-to-end development.
exp_hobby_desc: Discovered coding as a hobby by creating Discord bots using Node.js and Discord.js, which sparked my passion for programming.
